metadata.title: CVE-2020-14393 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A buffer overflow was found in perl-DBI < 1.643 in DBI.xs. A local attackerwho is able to supply a string longer than 300 characters could cause anout-of-bounds write, affecting the availability of the service or integrityof data.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
